text: Hadiya Khalaf Abbas (, 1958 â€“ 13 November 2021) was a Syrian politician. She was the Speaker of the People's Council of Syria from June 2016 to July 2017. She is the only woman elected to this position. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Syrian politicians Category:Legislative speakers Category:2021 deaths
